1 #permalink Colors

A curated color palette using OKLCH color space for consistent, accessible, and perceptually uniform colors across the design system.

Source: src/assets/scss/theme/_colors.scss, line 1

1.1 #permalink Complete Palette

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

All five colors derived from the base color. This palette matches the Coolors scheme: https://coolors.co/bdede0-bbdbd1-070322-7e78d2-6f58c9

Example
Accent
#bdede0
Surface
#bbdbd1
Base
#070322
Secondary
#7e78d2
Primary
#6f58c9
Markup 
<div style="display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr); gap: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px;">
  <div style="background-color: var(--color-accent); padding: 30px; color: var(--base-color); text-align: center;">
    <strong>Accent</strong><br>#bdede0
  </div>
  <div style="background-color: var(--color-surface); padding: 30px; color: var(--base-color); text-align: center;">
    <strong>Surface</strong><br>#bbdbd1
  </div>
  <div style="background-color: var(--base-color); padding: 30px; color: white; text-align: center;">
    <strong>Base</strong><br>#070322
  </div>
</div>
<div style="display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); gap: 10px;">
  <div style="background-color: var(--color-secondary); padding: 30px; color: white; text-align: center;">
    <strong>Secondary</strong><br>#7e78d2
  </div>
  <div style="background-color: var(--color-primary); padding: 30px; color: white; text-align: center;">
    <strong>Primary</strong><br>#6f58c9
  </div>
</div>
Source: src/assets/scss/theme/_colors.scss, line 8

1.2 #permalink Semantic Colors

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

Colors mapped to specific use cases for consistency across the application. All derived from the base color using OKLCH transformations.

Example
Primary - Main brand color
Secondary - Supporting color
Accent - Highlight color
Surface - Background color
Markup 
<div style="display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); gap: 10px; margin-bottom: 10px;">
  <div style="background-color: var(--color-primary); padding: 20px; color: white;">
    Primary - Main brand color
  </div>
  <div style="background-color: var(--color-secondary); padding: 20px; color: white;">
    Secondary - Supporting color
  </div>
</div>
<div style="display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); gap: 10px;">
  <div style="background-color: var(--color-accent); padding: 20px; color: var(--base-color);">
    Accent - Highlight color
  </div>
  <div style="background-color: var(--color-surface); padding: 20px; color: var(--base-color); border: 1px solid var(--base-color);">
    Surface - Background color
  </div>
</div>
Source: src/assets/scss/theme/_colors.scss, line 38

1.3 #permalink Action Colors

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

Colors for interactive elements with hover and active states.

Examples
Default styling
Default
Hover
Active
--action-color
Default action state
Default
Hover
Active
--action-color-hover
Hover state (+10% lightness)
Default
Hover
Active
--action-color-active
Active/pressed state (-10% lightness)
Default
Hover
Active
Markup 
<div style="display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr); gap: 10px;">
  <div style="background-color: var(--action-color); padding: 20px; color: white;">
    Default
  </div>
  <div style="background-color: var(--action-color-hover); padding: 20px; color: white;">
    Hover
  </div>
  <div style="background-color: var(--action-color-active); padding: 20px; color: white;">
    Active
  </div>
</div>
Source: src/assets/scss/theme/_colors.scss, line 65
